price: que guía al sendero recto. Creemos en la recitación y no caeremos en la idolatría adorando a otro que Dios.
arabic: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yahdī ilā al-rush'di faāmannā bihi walan nush'rika birabbinā aḥadan
